enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.control

Class GameControlImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.control.GameControlImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameControl

    public class GameControlImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameControl
    Main control for a Yatzy game. Implementation of the GameControl interface. Object created by calling a static facotry method to get an empty object. The empty object need to be populated with Scoring and Roll behavior before use. Created by Jan Eriksson on 16/11/15.
